price: noong nagsabi sa kanila ang kapatid nilang si Ṣāliḥ: “Hindi ba kayo mangingilag magkasala?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum ṣāliḥun alā tattaqūna
